node.title: 20yo linked to COVID cruise and superspreader event fined $10k as Newcastle festival cancelled
node.alt: Young people at an exciting festival with bright lights.
node.description: The man was told to isolate, but attended last week'sÂ Argyle House event, which has been linked to hundreds of cases. Meanwhile, NSW Health has shut down a music festival planned for this weekend.
node.content:
["A man who\u00a0ignored instructions to\u00a0isolate after he was linked to an infectious party on a\u00a0Sydney party boat has been fined $10,000.", "The news coincides with the cancellation of a\u00a0music festival that was to be held on\u00a0Newcastle's foreshore on Saturday.", "The 20-year-old was instructed to isolate for seven days, but attended the Argyle House nightclub in Newcastle on December 8, along with nearly 700 others.", "At least 200 people who were at the nightclub have since tested positive for COVID-19 in what has been described as one of the biggest superspreader events in the world this year.", "The man issued two infringement notices by police, each of which carried a $5,000 fine.", "The Hunter New England (HNE) Health District recorded 633\u00a0new cases of coronavirus today, up from yesterday's figure of 424.", "There are 1,452 active cases in district, with nine in hospital and two in intensive care.", "
Festival shut down
", "Thousands were expected to attend the\u00a0Lunar Electric music festival on Saturday, but amid Newcastle's public health crisis NSW Health cancelled the event.", "\"NSW Health considered that the ongoing spread of COVID-19 in the Newcastle area, where the majority of a record number of cases are the Omicron variant of concern, presents too great a risk for the festival to take place this weekend,\" NSW Health\u00a0said in a statement.", "\"NSW Health continues to be concerned about the ongoing spread of COVID-19 in the Newcastle area, where several venues and events have now seen extensive transmission.", "\"The emergence of the Omicron variant is a timely reminder of the importance of booster shots in maintaining a high level of protection against the COVID-19 virus.\"", "", "
The Cambridge in Newcastle West has been caught up in the city's Omicron outbreak.(ABC Newcastle: Bindi Bryce)
", "
Pub shuts, aged care worker infected
", "Anyone who went to the Cambridge Hotel in Newcastle West from 6:30pm Friday December 10 to 2:30am Saturday\u00a0December 11 is considered a close contact\u00a0and must immediately get tested and isolate for seven\u00a0days.", "Members of their households are also advised to get a test.", "NSW Health said it was\u00a0likely that some of the patrons at the hotel during the specified\u00a0time would\u00a0be\u00a0carrying the Omicron variant.", "Meanwhile, in Scone, sections of an aged care facility are in lockdown after a fully vaccinated employee contracted the virus.", "A cottage at HammondCare's Strathearn House has been locked down and staff are under instruction to wear full PPE.", "\"HammondCare has informed the Public Health Unit and testing is underway of staff and residents as a precaution,\" chief operating and risk officer Angela Raguz said.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
